@graph.caption: Slices of beet and strawberry wheat loaf spread out on a white plate

@graph.name: Beet and Strawberry Wheat loaf - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Beet and Strawberry Wheat Loaf. A whole wheat loaf made with cooked beet and strawberry puree. Delicious toasted for breakfast.Â

@graph.name: Beet And Strawberry Bread
@graph.description: Beet and Strawberry Wheat Loaf. A whole wheat loaf made with cooked beet and strawberry puree. Delicious toasted for breakfast.
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg ((can be substituted for 1 teaspoon vegan butter))

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the strawberries and beet together using a little water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the strawberries and beet together using a little water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the puree with 3 tablespoons raw sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg for 5-6 minutes until it thickens a little. You can use this as pancake topping as well!
recipeInstructions.name: Boil the puree with 3 tablespoons raw sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg for 5-6 minutes until it thickens a little. You can use this as pancake topping as well!

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/4 cup (60ml) water and 1 tablespoon sugar and add yeast to it. Mix well and let sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/4 cup (60ml) water and 1 tablespoon sugar and add yeast to it. Mix well and let sit for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flours, salt, vital wheat gluten, flax egg, oil and puree and knead into a soft dough. Knead for at least 5 minutes and use more flour or water if necessary. The syrupy puree will make the dough a bit sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flours, salt, vital wheat gluten, flax egg, oil and puree and knead into a soft dough. Knead for at least 5 minutes and use more flour or water if necessary. The syrupy puree will make the dough a bit sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container where it can double in volume. Spritz top of the dough with oil spray and Cover with damp towel and let rest for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container where it can double in volume. Spritz top of the dough with oil spray and Cover with damp towel and let rest for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Take dough and shape into a rectangle. Then roll it up and place in bread pan with seam side down. Spritz top with water then oil and cover with damp towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Take dough and shape into a rectangle. Then roll it up and place in bread pan with seam side down. Spritz top with water then oil and cover with damp towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes, then 350 for another 10 or 15 until bread sounds hollow.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes, then 350 for another 10 or 15 until bread sounds hollow.

@graph.keywords: fruit bread, vegan bread, vegetable bread
